section.title: congestion
section.para: congestion command interacts with org.mobincets.slee:name=CongestionControlConfiguration Bean. It is a non standard SLEE MBean. Please refer to its documentation for details. congestion allows you to change configuration of congestion mechanism. For instance, free memory level which will disable congestion mechanism. It supports the following operations:

section.title: period
section.para:
period operation allows to manage period between congestion checks. Period is expressed in seconds. This operation does not support argument. It supports following options:
--get
instructs operation to fetch period between congestion checks. Does not support argument.
--set
instructs operation to set period between congestion checks. Requires number of seconds as argument.

disable-level operation allows you to manage minimum level of free memory for congestion mechanism to stop better optimize the container. It does not support argument. It supports following options
--get
instructs operation to fetch number MBs. Does not support argument.
--set
instructs operation to set number of MBs to stop congestion mechanism. Requires number of MB (MegaBytes).

section.title: enable-level
section.para:
enable-level operation allows you to manage minimum level of free memory to trigger congestion mechanism. It does not support argument. It support following options:
--get
instructs operation to fetch number MBs. Does not support argument.
--set
instructs operation to set number of MBs to start congestion mechanism. Requires number of MB (MegaBytes).

section.title: refuse-event
section.para:
refuse-event operation allows you to manage how congestion mechanism behaves. This operation allows you to manage whether events are allowed to be fired into container or not. It does not support argument. It supports following options:
--get
instructs operation to check if events will not be fired in case of congestion. Does not support argument.
--set
instructs operation to disallow events to be fired. It requires boolean argument(true - disallow).

section.title: refuse-activity
section.para:
refuse-activity operation allows you to manage how congestion mechanism behaves. This operation allows you to manage whether new activities can be created in container or not. It does not support argument. It supports following options:
--get
instructs operation to check if new activities will be refused in case of congestion. Does not support argument.
--set
instructs operation to disallow new activities creation. It requires boolean argument(true - disallow).
